name: Gem Trader
description: Trade 2 red gems for 1 blue gem

name: Gem Collector
description: Gain 1 green gem for every 3 gems you own

name: Purple Seeker
description: Gain 1 purple gem if you have at least 2 of each gem

name: Red Dominator
description: Gain 1 point for every 5 red gems you own

name: Blue Master
description: Gain 2 points if you have more blue gems than any other player

name: Green Guardian
description: Gain 1 green gem for every 2 green gems you own

name: Purple Hoarder
description: Gain 3 points if you have at least 3 purple gems

name: Gem Balancer
description: Gain 1 point for every set of 1 red, 1 blue, and 1 green gem
